tool_description: HHblits is used to iteratively search a query sequence against a protein sequence database, generating high-quality multiple sequence alignments (MSAs) and a profile for downstream analysis.

required_parameters.name: query_sequence
required_parameters.description: A single protein sequence that will be used as the query for homology searches.

optional_parameters.name: n_iter
optional_parameters.description: The number of search iterations to refine the multiple sequence alignment.

optional_parameters.name: evalue
optional_parameters.description: The E-value threshold for including sequences in the MSA.

return_values.name: alignment_file
return_values.description: A multiple sequence alignment (MSA) file of homologous sequences identified during the search.
